content.rendered:
Accident Injury Treatments

Our Chiropractic office near Sunnyvale is available for accident injury treatments.

Auto accidents are known to cause a variety of injuries that may not be readily apparent directly after the collision. These injuries can include sprains and strains, herniated discs and whiplash. The good news is that Dr. Tony provides auto accident injury treatments for individuals who have recently or not so recently been in a collision.

Common Injuries Experienced in a Car Accident

When you are in a car accident, your body ricochets between the seatbelt and seat, which can cause whiplash. If you have your hands on the steering wheel or stick-shift, your wrist may experience sprains and strains, and your knees may impact the dash, causing bruising and injuries to the knees. You may also experience shoulder injuries from being held back by the seatbelt and herniated discs in your lower back and neck.

Signs You Have a Car Accident Injury that Needs Chiropractic Treatment

Depending on your auto accident injury, you may experience a wide range of symptoms. If you have whiplash, you may experience an increase in headaches, a stiff or sore neck and sensitivity to light and sound. In severe instances, you may also experience pain and soreness in your upper back and tingling down one or both arms.

If you have a joint injury in your knees, wrists or shoulders, you may experience pain, inflammation, and loss of range of motion. If you experience a herniated disc during your accident, you may have pain in the area of the disc herniation as well as pain that radiates into the legs.

Auto Accident Injury Treatments from Dr. Tony

Our auto accident injury chiropractor provides treatments for whiplash, shoulder, wrist and knee injuries and herniated discs that are the result of a car accident.

Chiropractic Adjustments and Care

Chiropractic adjustments and our chiropractic care modalities are used to treat joint misalignments in the back, neck and extremity joints. These treatments help decrease healing times, reduce inflammation and improve the range of motion of the joints.

Targeted Massage Therapy

Targeted massage therapy is used to help relax muscles and tendons in order to help reduce pain and inflammation while improving localized circulation. Massage therapy can be utilized before or after chiropractic adjustments.

Spinal Decompression Therapy

Spinal decompression therapy is used for treating herniated discs in the back and neck and unpinching compressed nerves. The treatment involves applying a targeted force to the specific area of the back or neck with the disc herniation in order to increase the spaces between the vertebrae. This gives the disc room to retract and heal.

For more information about accident injury treatment contact Tropea Chiropractic Inc at (408) 329-9604.

Comprehensive Car Accident Chiropractic Services for Your Recovery

Are you looking for a car accident chiropractic near me? You are in the right place. Here, you will find the right solution at the right time.
At Tropea Chiropractic INC, we prioritize your well-being and recovery after a car accident.

Dr.Tony has dedicated years to learning and providing exceptional care to help people regain mobility, reduce pain, and restore their overall health. We understand the challenges people face after a car accident, and our goal is to support your journey to recovery.

Our Car Accident Chiropractic Services Near You Following a car accident, chiropractic care can be a valuable part of your recovery process. Timely help can reduce the damage and ensure quick recovery. Dr. Tony specializes in providing chiropractic solutions for accident-related injuries. Our Car Accident Chiropractic Services include a comprehensive approach to provide the best results. It includes:

● Initial Assessment: Our experienced chiropractor will conduct a thorough assessment to identify the extent of your injuries. By undergoing this initial evaluation, you can benefit from a bespoke treatment plan that is designed exclusively for you and your requirements.
● Spinal Adjustments: It is a key component in addressing the injuries sustained during a car accident. Realigning the spine will help reduce pain, improve mobility, and enhance overall functionality.
● Soft Tissue Therapy: Targeted massages can help with the recovery process. This particular technique includes massage, stretching, and targeted exercises to enhance flexibility and strength.
● Rehabilitation Exercises: Our rehabilitation exercises aim to strengthen weakened muscles, improve range of motion, and prevent future injuries, which are essential for the long-term recovery process. Why Choose Tropea Chiropractic INC At Tropea Chiropractic INC, we follow a specific procedure so that you can get the right treatment without any hassle. Here is a breakdown of our process:
Personalized Approach:

● Our car accident chiropractic care is tailored to your unique needs.
● We recognize individual responses to treatment vary.
● Tailoring our methods ensures efficient care and a faster recovery.

Experienced Chiropractor:
● Dr. Tony specializes in car accident injuries and has a deep understanding of
injury complexities.

● Our experienced chiropractor provides targeted, comprehensive care for your
specific concerns.

State-of-the-Art Facilities:
● We boast state-of-the-art facilities, equipped with the latest technology.
● We utilize cutting-edge resources to provide top-notch care.

Most Common Car Accident Injuries:

If you’ve recently been in a car accident, our chiropractic solution can help. Our specialized care is designed to address a variety of injuries resulting from accidents. Let us help you get back on the road to recovery.

This includes:

● Neck injury from sudden jerking motion, which is very common in rear-end collisions.
● Broken bones resulting often from high-impact crashes.
● Head trauma causing altered consciousness. It occurs when the brain collides with the skull.
● Chiropractic treatment of damaged muscles, ligaments, and tendons. This results from sudden impact or jolts.
● Superficial injuries from contact with vehicle parts, such as seat belts and airbags can cause minor abrasions.
● Damage to the spine, leading to mobility issues.

BOOK APPOINTMENT:
If you are looking for reliable car accident chiropractic near me, call us today at (408) 329-9604 to schedule an appointment. Or use this page to contact us.
